alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 9:27PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Phillips and west central Valley Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 927 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dodson, or 17 miles west of Malta, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Dodson, Wagner and Content. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley
